channel.title: Jar maker issue, pls come read and help me :)
channel.description:
Hi !
So i have Jar maker .. A client , and a source (317 delta )
I tried to make a jar with all my client files .
I have signed it , and the jar file work . But ! When i go on, it say : Client updated : Connecting error , try again in ..
Why ? :/
Thanks for the help :)
